item.description:
This is a beginner level dance class in a small venue. Lessons start at 7:00 and are $5.00. Each week an easy choreography is taught, and the last 3 dances learned are reviewed. After that it's all request dancing till 9:00. Before you know it you'll be dancing the night away. Vance is a wonderful teacher. To read more about him & line dance check out this article: http://www.thereminde...
Space is somewhat limited for this event. If there's interest this may become a weekly item.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at a table to the right of the entry door looking for people who look lost :)
item.why: It's fun! It's healthy! It's a stress-buster!
item.name: Line Dance with Vance
